title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Whisk eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked.
Fry onions and add tomato puree.
Mix grilled chicken with the sauce. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
